title: My Family
description: A child introduces their family members
transcript: Hello! I want to tell you about my family. This is my father. His name is John. He is tall. This is my mother. Her name is Sarah. She is kind. I have one brother. His name is Tom. He is ten years old. I also have a sister. Her name is Lily. She is five. We have a dog. His name is Max. I love my family very much.
